metadata.title: CVE-2022-1296 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Out-of-bounds read in `r_bin_ne_get_relocs` function in GitHub repositoryradareorg/radare2 prior to 5.6.8. This vulnerability may allow attackers toread sensitive information or cause a crash.

criterions.comment: radare2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
